channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
channel.description:
### Had these classes sitting in my documents, figured I'd throw down all the classes I didn't want to post before.
# [color=lighblue]The Custodian (Blue Dragon Support)[/color]
**Night Ability 1: Corridor Guide** Select a player. You will go with them to ensure they are not disturbed and make them Occupy immune tonight. If they are attacked, you will die in their place. - Infinite uses
**Day Ability 1: Insurance Policy** Select a player. If they are the victim of a day ability, you will be informed of the user. This will be in effect until you move your Insurance Policy to another player. - Infinite uses
# [color=purple]The Curator (Unseen Offensive)[/color]
**Night Ability 1: Unhelpful Guide** Select 2 players. You will go force your first target to go to the second target if your first target uses an ability tonight. You will not die if they are attacked. - 2 uses
**Night Ability 2: Pass The Blame** You will go with the Assassin tonight. The Assassin will not show up in any observational's results. You and anyone visiting you and the Assassin will appear on the observational results. (Princess' Wisp, Observer's Follow, etc). - 2 uses
**Day Ability 1: Life Insurance** If the Mastermind is executed on trial today, you will take his place. - 2 uses
----
# [color=lighblue]The Patron (Blue Dragon Offensive)[/color]
**Night Ability 1: Invested Silence** Select a player. They will be unable to whisper or be whispered to this day. - Infinite uses.
**Night Ability 2: Bankrupt** Select a player. If they are Royal Blooded, they will lose that Passive. If not, they will be unable to vote anybody this day. - 3 uses.
**Day Ability 1: Bribery** Select a player. If they are voted up to trial, they will be instantly pardoned and unable to be voted back up. - 2 uses
# [color=purple]The Advocate (Unseen Offensive)[/color]
**Night Ability 1: Invested Silence** Select a player. They will be unable to whisper or be whispered to this day. - Infinite uses.
**Night Ability 2: Paid Entertainment** Select 2 players. You will force them to perform their night actions on each other. - 2 uses
**Day Ability 1: Bribery** Select a player. If they are voted up to trial, they will be instantly pardoned and unable to be voted back up. - 2 uses
----
# [color=lighblue]The Steward (Blue Dragon Investigative)[/color]
**Night Ability 1: Room Sweep** Select a player. You will check their room to see what they could be. - Infinite Uses [details=Results] -They have a big sword! They could be a Knight, Mercenary, Sellsword or Enforcer -They have knives! They could be a Hunter, Poacher, Cult Leader or Assassin -They have chemicals! They could be a Physician, Herbalist, Ritualist or Alchemist -They have guests! They could be a Mastermind, Prince, Priest or Soulcatcher -They have anger problems! They could be a Drunk, Alcoholic, Invoker or Scorned -They have a spooky room! They could be a Psychic, Illusionist or Reaper -They have spellbooks! They could be a Court Wizard, Sage or Possessor -They have wine! They could be a Butler, Servant or Fool -They have a fancy cloak! They could be a Paladin, Princess or Duchess -They have spyglasses! They could be a Sheriff, Marshall, Observer or Nightwatch -They have scriptures! They could be a Noble, Aristocrat or Apostle [/details]
**Day Ability 1: Slide Note** Select a player. You will pass a completely anonymous note to them, which they can reply to once, anonymously. - 3 uses.
# [color=purple]The Overseer (Unseen Investigative)[/color]
**Night Ability 1: Raid Room** Select a player. You will check their room and reveal your information to the rest of the Unseen at beginning of the next day if you survive. - 4 uses. _(Same results as above)_
**Day Ability 1: Slide Note** Select a player. You will pass a completely anonymous note to them, which they can reply to once, anonymously. - 3 uses.

They keep royal blood. I know, I have been converted noble way back when.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I will say however that custodian has a knight’s guard ability with he added effect of making them occupy immune, and has investigative capabilities. Seems much better than knight - cold steel is rarely used

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Introducing a ToS-like Investigator would single-handedly change the meta of the game. I enjoy being able to claim multiple classes in FoL and not feel restricted to staying within investigation results. Just the mere existence of an Investigator class would alter how people play, regardless or not if it actually spawned in the game. This is similar to the Spy in ToS, and why it got nerfed into the ground.

I think the Patron hurts BD more than it helps them. Whispering is more of a BD activity since scum have night chat already. BD also has more Royal Blood members at the beginning of the game. On the other hand, Bribery is insanely powerful as it is half of a King’s Decide Fate, but can be used twice. The design of this ability on a BD member is odd – the only time you would be effectively using this is when scum have majority and they don’t realize you are a Patron, or you know that somebody is BD 100% and nobody else realizes it. Without investigation abilities, you’re confined to scum reading alone which makes this ability seem weird to me.

I like the other classes for the most part. Do you agree that the Custodian should be Occupy immune like the Butler as well? It’s a little weak on its own.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I like custodian

in unseen games, you can find the assassin; in cult games, you can find the cult leader via sacrifices

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: Methnor
item.description:
I’m sheeping Jammy on this one. I already have enough princesses ruining my Court Wizard claims.

I like Custodian and Patron.

I mean, I liked Custodian and Curator.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
ThePlex:

throw down all the classes I didn’t want to post before.

/shrug

I originally didn’t want to post these three anyway cause I knew nobody would like them. The only reason I posted them was to see if there was any interest for people.

But people shouldn’t be so quick to shoot down something like an Investigator, or something similar. It wouldn’t have to do the same thing with the same results but it’d be interesting to see how it’d work with conversions in play.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
As much as I hate to do so, I agree with norm

I dislike the ToS Investigator with a passion, it reduces claimspace and is generally an arse to deal with

The best part of ToL is the fact that claimspace is so open and this would reduce that

Plus we already have Princess to do stuff like this

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Investigator did not have a 100% spawn rate, but EVERYONE in ToS claimed by the investigator’s results.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace

I can understand why invoker isn’t with he same result as all it’s previous forms, because that is impossible.

that is why it doesn’t’ work in ToL

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

I don’t see your point, I just see a comparison to ToS but I don’t see any valid reason why it can’t exist within the confines of Throne of Lies.

ThePlex:

-They have a big sword! They could be a Knight, Mercenary, Sellsword or Enforcer

assassin, reaper, and poss can no longer claim knight, not to mention different result for invoker.

ThePlex:

-They have knives! They could be a Hunter, Poacher, Cult Leader or Assassin

cult leader, assassin and poacher all have to claim hunter? But hunter is unique.

ThePlex:

-They have chemicals! They could be a Physician, Herbalist, Ritualist or Alchemist

This one is not as detrimental

ThePlex:

-They have guests! They could be a Mastermind, Prince, Priest or Soulcatcher

gives the MM only claim space for priest or prince. One is unique, the other a death sentence.

ThePlex:

-They have anger problems! They could be a Drunk, Alcoholic, Invoker or Scorned

scorned can’t claim to be an investigative class

ThePlex:

-They have a spooky room! They could be a Psychic, Illusionist or Reaper

reaper can only claim psychic, an easily confirm able class that is unique.

ThePlex:

-They have spellbooks! They could be a Court Wizard, Sage or Possessor

Not as bad, except on possessor can claim court wizard.

ThePlex:

-They have wine! They could be a Butler, Servant or Fool

This one is fine, same problem as CW though, and butler to invoker is different result.

ThePlex:

-They have a fancy cloak! They could be a Paladin, Princess or Duchess

No one but duchess can claim princess now

ThePlex:

-They have spyglasses! They could be a Sheriff, Marshall, Observer or Nightwatch

fine, but once again, no more obs/sher claims for anyone else

ThePlex:

-They have scriptures! They could be a Noble, Aristocrat or Apostle

this is fine

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

Every time I played mafioso in ToS I claimed vigilante. Every time I was godfather I claimed body guard. Every time I was serial killer I claimed doctor.

Severely diminishes replay ability.

I don’t see your point, I just see a comparison to ToS but I don’t see any valid reason why it can’t exist within the confines of Throne of Lies.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Various Classes
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

That’s a matter of opinion. You didn’t even give a reason why.

Every time I played mafioso in ToS I claimed vigilante. Every time I was godfather I claimed body guard. Every time I was serial killer I claimed doctor.

Severely diminishes replay ability.

Read full topic
